doc.course_introduction: This module aims at introducing fundamental concepts of visual perception applied to information visualization. These concepts help the student ideate and evaluate visualization designs in terms of how well they leverage the capabilities of the human perceptual machinery.
doc.course_orgnization: New York University Tandon School of Engineering
doc.course_chapter: Applied Perception for Information Visualization//Effectiveness of Visual Channels//Color Perception and Color Spaces//Using Color in Visualization
